content: easy lacy blanket knitted in the round all in one piece starting from the centre you can adjust the size easily by knitting more or less repeats the yarn is held double throughout the project and how to do the gradient is described in the pattern the seed stitch edging will eat up almost a whole skein of the recommended yarn you can use almost any combo of hand-dyed variegated sock-weight yarn you ll need at least 3 colours for best results the gauge is not too important not too loose not too tight
